titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Transportation to complete construction of the Hubbard Expressway in the vicinity of Youngstown, Ohio.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

bill.summary: 3/3/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Transportation to carry out a highway project to complete construction of the Hubbard Expressway in the vicinity of Youngstown, Ohio. Authorizes appropriations.
